description: Define a JSON Schema response format for structured outputs from LLMs.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Optional override for the name of the response format, used to identify the schema.

inputs.name: strict
inputs.description: Optional override for strict mode. When true, the model must follow the schema exactly.

inputs.name: schema
inputs.description: Optional override for the JSON Schema definition that the model response must follow.

outputs.name: response_format
outputs.description: The response format object definition for structured outputs.

settings.name: name
settings.description: The name of the response format, used to identify the schema.

settings.name: strict
settings.description: When true, the model must follow the schema exactly. When false, the model can be more flexible.

settings.name: schema
settings.description: The JSON Schema definition that the model response must follow.
